# Fees Generated by Your Deployed Contracts

## Overview

This document tracks the fees and revenue generated by the deployed contracts in this task.

## Deployed Contracts

### Ber4Token (ERC20)

**Contract Address**: `[TO_BE_FILLED_AFTER_DEPLOYMENT]`  
**Network**: Base Mainnet  
**Deployment Date**: `[TO_BE_FILLED]`  
**Transaction Hash**: `[TO_BE_FILLED]`  
**Etherscan Link**: `https://basescan.org/address/[CONTRACT_ADDRESS]`

#### Contract Details

- **Token Name**: ber4
- **Token Symbol**: ber4
- **Decimals**: 18
- **Initial Supply**: 1,000,000 tokens (1M * 10^18)
- **Total Supply**: 1,000,000 tokens (fixed, no minting function)
- **Token Type**: Standard ERC20 (L2 native)

#### Fee Structure

This is a standard ERC20 token with **no built-in fee mechanism**. Fees may be generated through:

- **Trading Fees**: If the token is listed on DEXs (Uniswap, etc.), trading fees may apply (determined by the DEX, typically 0.05% - 0.3%)
- **Transfer Fees**: Standard ERC20 transfers have no fees, but gas fees apply for all transactions
- **Liquidity Pool Fees**: If LP tokens are created, fees may be generated from trading activity

#### Revenue Tracking

| Date | Transaction Type | Amount | Fee Collected | Fee Recipient | Notes |
|------|-----------------|--------|---------------|---------------|-------|
| - | - | - | - | - | No fees generated directly by this contract |

#### Cumulative Statistics

- **Total Fees Collected**: 0 (No fee mechanism in contract)
- **Total Transactions**: `[TO_BE_TRACKED]`
- **Token Holders**: `[TO_BE_TRACKED]`
- **Last Updated**: `[DATE]`

## Fee Collection Addresses

- **Deployer Address**: `[TO_BE_FILLED]` (Initial token recipient)
- **Fee Recipient**: N/A (No fee mechanism in contract)
- **Treasury Address**: N/A

## Fee Distribution Mechanism

This contract does not have a built-in fee distribution mechanism. Any fees would come from:

1. **DEX Trading**: If listed on DEXs, fees go to liquidity providers
2. **External Services**: Any fees from external integrations
3. **Gas Fees**: Paid by users, not collected by contract

## Monitoring

### On-chain Monitoring

- **Block Explorer**: [BaseScan](https://basescan.org)
- **Contract Address**: `[TO_BE_FILLED]`
- **Monitoring Tools**: 
  - Track token transfers
  - Monitor trading volume (if listed on DEX)
  - Track holder count

### Analytics

- **DEX Analytics**: Monitor if token is listed on DEXs
- **Token Tracking**: Use token tracking dashboards
- **Custom Scripts**: Create scripts to track token metrics

## Fee Parameters

| Parameter | Value | Description |
|-----------|-------|-------------|
| Transfer Fee | 0% | No transfer fees |
| Trading Fee | Variable | Determined by DEX (if listed) |
| Minting | Disabled | Fixed supply, no minting |

## Notes

- This token contract does **not generate fees directly**
- Any fees would come from external interactions (DEX trading, etc.)
- Gas fees are paid by users, not collected by the contract
- Token has fixed supply - no minting or burning functions
- Update this document after deployment with actual contract addresses
- Monitor DEX listings to track potential trading fees
